sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Parses a JSON string into a human-readable message and sends it via email.
The Action has two steps:
1. Script step to parse and format JSON (plain text or HTML). 2. Email step to send the formatted output to the specified recipient.
Flow Action is generic and reusable: 1. Works for any JSON. 2. Can send to one or many recipients. 3. Subject is customizable. 4. Output is selectable (plain text or HTML).
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Parse JSON and Send Email

Parses a JSON string into a human-readable message and sends it via email.
The Action has two steps:
1. Script step to parse and format JSON (plain text or HTML). 2. Email step to send the formatted output to the specified recipient.
Flow Action is generic and reusable: 1. Works for any JSON. 2. Can send to one or many recipients. 3. Subject is customizable. 4. Output is selectable (plain text or HTML).
